JayBox

A gulp framework with plenty of tasks to take care of styling, scripts, image compression and speedier markup through Nunjucks.

Inspired from my time at Our Name is Mud and their MudStone framework.

I wanted to build a cornerstone framework from scratch for myself using technologies I liked and something I can grow over time.
